title: Bug 6672jar no longer exported after attach source
OB: Bug 6672jar no longer exported after attach source Attach source (say resourcessrc.zip) to the jar.Notice, the jar is no longer exportedthis information is discarded duringthe attach source process.
SR: Bug 6672jar no longer exported after attach source Create a project test.2. Add a jar (say resources.jar) to the classpath and export the entry3. Attach source (say resourcessrc.zip) to the jar.Notice, the jar is no longer exportedthis information is discarded duringthe attach source process.
